115106.トロッコの動力装置のようだ。\n今は 動かすのは やめておこう……。:

Let's not move it now.

115110.トロッコに エネルギーが供給されたようだ。:
Looks like energy has been supplied to

115113.しかし ウルベア魔神兵は立ち上がれないようだ。\nどうやら 脚部のボルトが ゆる:
However, Urbea Aztech seems to be unable to stand up. Apparently, the bolts on its legs are loose and cannot
support its weight. If there is something to tighten the bolts, Urbea Aztech might be able to stand up. I'll
look for it here in the courtyard.

115114.ウルベア魔神兵は 立ち上がれないようだ。\nどうやら 脚部のボルトが ゆるんでい:
Urbea Aztech can't seem to get up. Apparently, the bolts on her legs are loose and she cannot support her
weight. Would you like to use the Ancient Wrench to tighten the bolts?

115115.<pc>は 古代のレンチを使って\nウルベア魔神兵のボルトを しめなおした！\n:
<pc> used the Ancient Wrench
to re-shime Urbea Aztech's bolt!

115116.ウルベア魔神兵は よろよろと起き上がると\n扉に向かって 何かの信号を送ったよう:
Urbea Aztech staggered up and seemed
to send some kind of signal toward the
door.

115117.ウルベア魔神兵は もう 動かないようだ……。: Urbea Aztech no longer seems to work.

115118.古いガレキの山のようだ。\nそこに ボロボロの手記がある。\n<pc>は 手記を:
It looks like a pile of old rubble. There is a tattered memoir there. picked up the journal
and read it.

115119.今日も リウ老師は お帰りにならなかった。\n私は もう長くない……。\nきっと:
Master Liu did not return today. I am Chang Kunai, and I am sure we will never meet again. If I have any
regrets about the closed laboratory, it is that Urbea AztechNumber 08 is still guarding its doors. I can't even
relieve him of his orders. Please pray that Master Liu will return soon and give that child a peaceful time. The
diary ends here. received an Ancient Wrench (Key Item) from the side of the journal!

115120.トロッコは 停止している。\nよく見ると トロッコの車輪が\nひとつ 外されてい:
Minecart is stopped. Upon closer inspection, one of the Minecart wheels seems to have been removed. There are
true new scratch marks around the removed wheel, as if they were made by clawing. Let's defeat the monster and
get back the Minecart Wheel.

115121.トロッコは 停止している。\nよく見ると トロッコの車輪が\nひとつ 外されてい:
Minecart is stopped. Upon closer inspection, one of the Minecart Wheels seems to have been removed. Would you
like to put the Minecart Wheel back on?

116740.「申シ訳 アリマセン……。\n タダイマ 扉…ノ解錠命令ハ……\n 実行…スルコ:

116743.「……オォ ソノ れんちハ……！\n アリガトウゴザイマス リウ老師……。\n:
Oh, sono brick! Thank you Master Liu, it's been 3021 years since your last visit. I'm going to unlock the lab
area immediately.

116747.今日も リウ老師は お帰りにならなかった。\n私は もう長くない……。\nきっと:
Master Liu did not return today. I am Chang Kunai, and I am sure we will never meet again. If I have any
regrets about the closed laboratory, it is that Urbea AztechNumber 08 is still guarding its doors. I can't even
relieve him of his orders. Please pray that Master Liu will return soon and give that child a peaceful time. The
diary ends here.

116969.「オ帰リニナラレテ ウレシイ…デス……。\n マタ コレカ…ラモ…………<se_:
I'm glad you could come back. I'm glad
you could come back.<se_nots S3_DWF5_001 001>

200398.「探知機……反応ヲ……感知…………\n 非常もーどデ 最終……再起動…………。:
Detector response detected. Emergency
mode de last reboot.

200399.「……オォ <pc>サマ……！\n ナント……ナント 懐カシイ…………。\n<b:
Oh sama! I miss you so much. I am Number 08. 3051 years have passed since then. I'm sorry that I
can't see your face enough due to the aging visual recognition system, but I'm glad to see you. Sama
Master Liu, I know that you are from the future and that you have crossed over from time to time. The sun
bullets in my body are the only countermeasure against the great demon that Master Liu has been working on
all his life. Please be sure to think of my future as an enemy of your enemy! That's all for now, the mission
to Samahe's mission to the Saport is over. Thank you very much for your cooperation, and good-
bye Sama.

200400.リウ老師の探知機が 機能を停止した\nウルベア魔神兵に 共鳴している……。:
Master Liu's Locator resonates with
Urbea Aztech, which has ceased to
function.

200401.胸の部分にすき間があって 開きそうだ。\n開けてみますか？<yesno><clo:
